To determine whether Tom makes a profit or incurs a debt from selling his old bedroom setup and buying a new one, we need to look at both transactions separately first.

When evaluating Profits / Losses : From Sale Of Old Bedroom Setup , let’s calculate earnings . Here , Earning= Amount Received - Cost Price   Earnings=(Amount Recipie By New Buyer)-Original Value Spent     Or    Earnings= $900,201,700-$3000                      Or                Earnings=$900,198,700            As the sellers earned nearly $900 thousand outright,the profitability index stands very high signalling good returns coming through sales process . Hence Sales Process Is Fruitful And Gains Are High        **Debts** :- Debts Refer To Obligations That Need To Be Paid Back At Some Point Down The Line ! They Signify Liabilities Which Come With Potential Financial Impact Over Time . It Could Mean An Unpleasant Experience Because When One Borrows Money You May Not Know Exactly What Will Happen Later
